questions.question: Microsoft Speech Service can only perform text-to-speech and does not offer any translation or speaker recognition functionalities.
Custom speech models can be trained to improve recognition accuracy for specific industries and applications.
Which of the following is a feature of Microsoft Speech Service designed to enhance accessibility for users with disabilities?
What is a common best practice when using synthesized voices generated by Speech Service?
options: Explicitly disclose the synthetic nature of voices
questions.answer: Explicitly disclose the synthetic nature of voices

questions.question: Explain how pronunciation assessment tools in Microsoft Speech Service can be beneficial for language learners.
questions.answer: Pronunciation assessment tools evaluate the fluency and accuracy of spoken language, providing feedback to help users improve their language learning and pronunciation skills.
